body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Blue Ridge Auto Dealership Customer Support. My name is Wayne Edwards. May I have the pleasure of knowing your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Wayne! My name is Christina Russell.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Christina. Could you please provide me with your phone number? We'll need it for verification purposes.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, four six two, eight nine one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Christina. And could you also share with me the spelling of your last name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for those details, Christina. Is there anything specific you'd like to discuss regarding our billing services at Blue Ridge Auto Dealership?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I have a question about an invoice I received recently.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Christina. Let's work together to resolve it. Thank you for sharing your details. If you have any other questions, feel free to ask. Your time is greatly appreciated!
